notes.text:
Red Hat Integration Camel for Spring Boot 3.20.4 release and security update is now available.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
A security update for 3.20.4 is now available.

The purpose of this text-only errata is to inform you about the security issues fixed.

Security Fix(es):

* JSON-java: parser confusion leads to OOM (CVE-2023-5072)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
notes.title: Details

notes.title: Terms of Use

publisher.issuing_authority: Red Hat Product Security is responsible for vulnerability handling across all Red Hat offerings.
publisher.name: Red Hat Product Security

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: Red Hat Integration Camel for Spring Boot 3.20.4 release and security update

cwe.name: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling

notes.text: A flaw was found in the org.json package. A bug in the parser exists, and an input string may lead to undefined usage of memory, leading to an out-of-memory error, causing a denial of service (DoS).
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: JSON-java: parser confusion leads to OOM
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: This vulnerability may cause denial of service with a small string input, causing the server to be unresponsive easily, hence the Important impact.
notes.title: Statement

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata relevant to your system have been applied.

For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
No current mitigation is available for this flaw.

vulnerabilities.title: JSON-java: parser confusion leads to OOM
